mapper.sql: SELECT memberId, pwd, name, phone, addr1, addr2, addr3, type, email, regDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBERID, PWD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, ADDR3 ) VALUES ( #{ memberId }, #{ pwd }, #{ name }, #{ phone }, #{ email }, #{ addr1 }, #{ addr2 }, #{ addr3 } )
mapper.select: FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBERID = #{ memberId } AND PWD = #{ pwd }
SELECT R.MEMBERID, R.RENTDATE, C.CAMPNAME, C.CATEGORY, C.PRICE, R.CAMPNO FROM RENT R, CAMP C WHERE R.CAMPNO = C.CAMPNO AND R.MEMBERID = #{ memberId } GROUP BY R.RENTDATE
SELECT B.MEMBERID, B.BUYDATE, B.ADDR1, B.ADDR2, B.ADDR3, P.NAME, P.CATEGORY, P.PRICE FROM PRODUCT P, BUY B WHERE P.PRODUCTNO = B.PRODUCTNO AND B.MEMBERID = #{ memberId } GROUP BY B.BUYDATE
SELECT CAMPNAME, CONTENT, PRICE, CATEGORY, MEMBERID FROM CAMP
